name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clippr - Save text and images from the web!

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily save text and images from the web!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ðŸ˜ª Tired of losing track of great content online?

Clippr is your one-stop shop for saving snippets of the web you don't want to forget. Text, images - Clippr grabs it all with a single click!

ðŸ¦¾ Organize like a pro:

Keep everything tidy with folders and personalize your clips with notes. Never lose that perfect recipe or hilarious meme again!

âž• Boost your productivity:

You can transfer your clips to other devices, so your inspiration is always with you.

ðŸ”¨ Features: 
   - Folders: Sort your clips for even more productivity.
   - Notes: Write more about what you're saving.
   - Board View: View clips in a Pinterest Board-like-view.
   - Image Edit: Crop & Edit images to see only what you want.
   - Folder Shortcuts: Automatically organize clips into folders based on the website they're from.
   - Multi Select: Select multiple clips and delete them at once.
   - Undo: Bring clips back after deleting them!
   - Themes: Choose a theme for Clippr!
   - Search: Find any clip instantly!

ðŸ™Œ Install Clippr today and conquer the web!
